H0.text: who made the nuclear model of an atom. J.J. Thomson

H1.text: who made the nuclear model of an atom. Niels Bohr

H2.text: who made the nuclear model of an atom. Robert Millikan

H3.text: who made the nuclear model of an atom. Ernest Rutherford

A4.text: In 1912, he invited Niels Bohr to join his lab, leading to the Bohr model of the atom.

A5.text: In 1911, he theorised that atoms have their charge concentrated in a very small nucleus.

A6.text: Rutherford presented a new model with a concentrated center of charge and mass
